title: Agent Work Ledger Schema
description: Schema for tracking agent activities and preventing duplicate work

actor.description: Who performed the work (agent:cursor, human:phil, etc.)

intent.description: Brief description of what was intended to accomplish

inputs.description: Key parameters or inputs that define the work

relatedFiles.description: List of repository files that were created or modified

evidence.description: Proof that the work was completed (commit SHA, file creation, etc.)

notes.description: 1-3 bullet points about constraints, follow-ups, or important details

fingerprint.description: SHA256 hash of (intent + JSON.stringify(inputs)) to detect duplicates
